dcterms:creator: B. Viswanath
A. Johri
C. Domeniconi
dcterms:description: A collection of Facebook wall posts available from KONECT, where users may post on each other’s walls, typically including comments, photos, and web links, recorded as interactions with a source user (the post author), a destination user (the owner of the wall), and a timestamp.
dcterms:title: Facebook wall posts

dcterms:creator: M. Resnick
J. Maloney
A. Monroy-Hernandez
M. R. Kafai
dcterms:description: A collection of comments on Scratch projects extracted from a general Scratch dataset available from the Harvard Dataverse, where users can comment on each other’s projects, recorded as interactions between two users.
dcterms:title: Scratch project comments
